text: Malus or Malos () was a town of ancient Galatia, inhabited during Roman and Byzantine times. It was the site of the martyrdom of Theodotus of Ancyra. Its site is located near Kalecik, in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Galatia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Ankara Province
title: Malus (Galatia)
